scripts.dev: concurrently -n convex,frontend,studio -c blue,green,magenta "pnpm run dev:convex" "pnpm run dev:frontend" "pnpm run dev:studio"
scripts.stop:all: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down; lsof -ti :3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti :4000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti :4111 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo 'All stopped'
scripts.type-check: concurrently "cd frontend && pnpm run type-check" "cd mastra && pnpm run type-check"
scripts.validate: pnpm run type-check && pnpm run lint
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd frontend && pnpm install && cd ../mastra && pnpm install
scripts.status: echo '=== Services ===' && docker ps --format 'table {{.Names}}	{{.Status}}	{{.Ports}}' | grep -E 'convex|NAME' && echo '' && echo '=== Node Processes ===' && lsof -i :3000 -i :4000 -i :4111 2>/dev/null | grep LISTEN || echo 'No Node processes found'
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/.next frontend/node_modules mastra/dist mastra/node_modules node_modules
